long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CloutReview — Chrome extension to review other BitClout users.

Get the real inside story from bitclouters like you. Read & write feedback on CloutReview to instantly see everyone's reputation.

Coin value doesn't show a full picture. The price could be easily pumped and dumped. Coins could be bought from fake accounts. Accounts themselves could be a well-planned fraud.

But what if we could have something more legit? That's why we're making CloutReview.

Features
– leave a (good, normal, bad) rating
– write the comment
– read reviews of others
